failure.message:
`cy.request()` failed on:
http://localhost:3000/produtos/undefined
The response we received from your web server was:
> 401: Unauthorized
This was considered a failure because the status code was not `2xx` or `3xx`.
If you do not want status codes to cause failures pass the option: `failOnStatusCode: false`
-----------------------------------------------------------
The request we sent was:
Method: PUT URL: http://localhost:3000/produtos/undefined Headers: { "Connection": "keep-alive", "authorization": {}, "user-agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) HeadlessChrome/124.0.0.0 Safari/537.36", "accept": "*/*", "accept-encoding": "gzip, deflate", "content-type": "application/json", "content-length": 86 } Body: {"nome":"Produto EBAC 32","preco":2210,"descricao":"Produto editado","quantidade":322}
-----------------------------------------------------------
The response we got was:
Status: 401 - Unauthorized Headers: { "access-control-allow-origin": "*", "x-dns-prefetch-control": "off", "x-frame-options": "SAMEORIGIN", "strict-transport-security": "max-age=15552000; includeSubDomains", "x-download-options": "noopen", "x-content-type-options": "nosniff", "x-xss-protection": "1; mode=block", "x-moesif-transaction-id": "cfeba4ad-9431-4fd4-85bc-56d0e7c30560", "content-type": "application/json; charset=utf-8", "content-length": "103", "date": "Tue, 23 Apr 2024 19:39:46 GMT", "connection": "keep-alive", "keep-alive": "timeout=5" } Body: { "message": "Token de acesso ausente, inválido, expirado ou usuário do token não existe mais" }
https://on.cypress.io/request

failure.message: expected { Object (nome, preco, ...) } to have keys 'nome', 'preco', 'descricao', and 'quantidade'

testcase.failure:
AssertionError: expected { Object (nome, preco, ...) } to have keys 'nome', 'preco', 'descricao', and 'quantidade' at eval (webpack://teste-api-serverest/./cypress/e2e/produtos.cy.js:34:44) at Context.eval (webpack://teste-api-serverest/./cypress/e2e/produtos.cy.js:33:21)
+ expected - actual
-[ '_id', 'descricao', 'nome', 'preco', 'quantidade' ] +[ 'descricao', 'nome', 'preco', 'quantidade' ]
